block.p: SILVER--Mona. On April 16, 2004. Beloved wife of the late Irving. Loving mother of Barbara Gross, Dr. Deborah Verlen and Susan Matthews. Dearest sister of Tanya Ostrove. Adoring grandmother of Jerry and Maggie Gross, Ira Gross, Jason and Ellen Verlen, and Zachary Haines. Great-grandmother of Wyatt and Danielle Verlen. Graveside service Tuesday, 2 pm, Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY.
